prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter to B. F. Butler, July 13, 1824, Accession #11005 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on February 26, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Jacob Barker, New York, New York, writes to B. F. Butler, Albany, New York, concerning a legal case involving a commercial transaction. A note in an unidentified hand claims the letter is in the hand of Fitz- Greene Halleck.
This is an electrostatic copy of the original letter held in Barrett PS1783 .D75 1868.
